readable.title: 3258395783_2de3a4ba27
readable.content: A camera team wearing jackets stands in front of a white building . A man is setting up a camera to take shots of something that ca n't be seen near a ZCHTV wall . A man shoots footage with a camera as two women look on . A man with long hair is looking through a camera . Three people stand outside one has a camera on a tripod .
